paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 gene variant rs199472885, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: One individual carried a mutation in the KCNH2 gene (rs199472885, R312C) previously found in a patient with congenital long QT syndrome.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with congenital long QT syndrome.

variants.additional_notes: The penetrance of the variant is not explicitly stated for other individuals.
key_quotes: One individual carried a mutation in the KCNH2 gene (rs199472885, R312C) previously found in a patient with congenital long QT syndrome.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper provided clear information on the KCNH2 variant.
